scripts.format: dart format flutter_inappwebview/lib flutter_inappwebview/example/integration_test flutter_inappwebview_platform_interface/lib flutter_inappwebview_android/lib flutter_inappwebview_ios/lib flutter_inappwebview_macos/lib  flutter_inappwebview_web/lib  flutter_inappwebview_windows/lib
scripts.build:publish: npm run format && npm run build && flutter pub publish
scripts.docs:gen: flutter pub global activate dartdoc && flutter pub global run dartdoc:dartdoc
scripts.docs:serve: flutter pub global activate dhttpd && flutter pub global run dhttpd:dhttpd --path doc/api
